TML wrapper for search results - ChatGPT compatible""" conn = None cursor = None try: write_log("DEBUG: mem_sea3. Restart the memory system: bashcd /var/www/memory_system # Check if it's running and stop it ps aux | grep memory_app # If running, kill the process or restart systemd service # Activate the virtual environment and restart source memory_venv/bin/activate python memory_app.py 4. Test the new HTML endpoints: bash# Test search (you'll need a real keyword that exists in your DB) curl -s "http://104.191.236.122:40001/mem/search?keyword=HISTORIC&limit=5&key=public-read-2025" | head -10 # Get the health check to see how many chats exist curl -s "http://104.191.236.122:40001/health" # Test with a real chat ID (you'll need to get one from a search first) curl -s "http://104.191.236.122:40001/mem/get?id=&key=public-read-2025" | head -10 Let me know when you've added the routes and restarted the app. Then we can test and configure nginx to serve these at https://api.nsgia.com/mem/!RetryMHmh@NSG:/var/www/memory_system$ # Test search (you'll need a real keyword that exists in your DB) curl -s "http://104.191.236.122:40001/mem/search?keyword=HISTORIC&limit=5&key=public-read-2025" | head -10 # Get the health check to see how many chats exist curl -s "http://104.191.236.122:40001/health" # Test with a real chat ID (you'll need to get one from a search first) curl -s "http://104.191.236.122:40001/mem/get?id=&key=public-read-2025" | head -10 404 Not Found
